title: Does John Kerry Own Multiple Houses, Cars, and Yachts?
subtitle: A late 2020 meme about the incoming U.S. climate envoy appeared to be based on news stories from the 2004 presidential election cycle.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: John Kerry, who was selected by U.S. President-elect Joe Biden to serve as climate envoy, owns six homes, two yachts, 12 cars, and a private jet.
